title: Flagg youngest ever to score 40 as Mavs fall in OT
content: Mavericks rookie Cooper Flagg became the youngest player in NBA history to score 40 points after he dropped 42 in an overtime loss Monday.

title: Chiefs' Mahomes has surgery for torn ACL, LCL
content: Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes underwent successful surgery Monday in Dallas to repair the tear in his left ACL. A league source told ESPN that Mahomes also had a torn LCL that was repaired.

title: Rodgers says win made extra special by 'castoffs'
content: Aaron Rodgers grinned as he shouted out the names of his teammates who helped the Steelers beat the Dolphins on Monday night -- Kenneth Gainwell, Connor Heyward, Marquez Valdes-Scantling, Asante Samuel Jr., Adam Thielen. They all had something in common.

title: Court: PSG owes Mbapp√© $70M in unpaid wages
content: A Paris labor court ruled on Tuesday that Paris Saint-Germain must pay more than ‚Ç¨60 million ($70m) to Kylian Mbapp√© in a dispute over unpaid wages and bonuses linked to the end of his contract before his 2024 move to Real Madrid.

title: Liverpool parade crash driver gets 21 years in jail
content: The driver who used his car as a "weapon" to plough through more than 100 people celebrating Liverpool's Premier League title has been sentenced to XXX years in jail.

title: Texas QB Manning to return for 2026 season
content: Texas quarterback Arch Manning will return to school to play in 2026, finally putting to rest questions about his future beyond this season.

title: Interim coach says U-M's players feel 'betrayed'
content: Michigan interim coach Biff Poggi said Monday his players feel betrayed and angry following the firing and arrest of former coach Sherrone Moore.

title: Rockets' Udoka lashes out at refs after OT loss
content: Rockets coach Ime Udoka was critical of the officiating after his team's OT loss to the Nuggets, calling out the crew for inconsistent calls.

content: NFL teams remained petty in Week 15 with the Pittsburgh Steelers poking fun at the Miami Dolphins after a huge home win.

content: The 2026 recruiting class is almost a wrap. These are the prospects who will be key factors next season.

content: Which top prospects shifted the most on our first rankings update? Here's our 100 big board for the 2026 class.

content: It's a tight race at the top of the 2026 draft. We talked to insiders to learn where things stand now.

content: UConn, Texas, South Carolina and UCLA remain 1-seeds -- and LSU is the only real challenger behind them.

content: The sixth in-season women's AP Top 25 poll is out. Here's what's next for every team in the standings.

content: With NBA trade season upon us, Bobby Marks examines the conversations happening across all 30 front offices.

content: Bobby Marks runs through every roster, mapping out which players can and cannot be traded before Feb. 5.

content: Micah Parsons and Patrick Mahomes both suffered significant knee injuries Sunday. What do they mean for the Packers' playoff push and the Chiefs' offseason plans?

title: Here's who is really to blame for Liverpool's struggles. Hint: It's not Salah or Slot
content: In the rush to blame Mohamed Salah and Arne Slot amid Liverpool's collapse, everyone is losing sight of who is really to blame.

content: A new penalty was seen in the Eredivisie as Heracles Almelo striker Jizz Hornkamp scored, but was it legal?

title: Man United's thriller against Bournemouth is advert for January transfer window
content: Manchester United and Bournemouth played out an entertaining match, but Ruben Amorim's side will need to improve ahead of next month's transfer window.

title: Ranking Jake Paul's boxing matches: Which knockout earned No. 1?
content: What moments have been the best and worst of Jake Paul's boxing career? Andreas Hale ranks each of Paul's fights.

title: On second thought: Regrading every 2025 UFC PPV
content: With the benefit of hindsight and comparison, take a look back at how all the UFC pay-per-views stack up.

content: With first-year success stories, redemption  chances and general silliness, bowl season always delivers.

title: Early Week 16 bets: Broncos over Jaguars, Drake Maye to win MVP among picks
content: Which lines offered value once odds came out? Here are games we are eyeing for bets going into Week 16.

title: Pickups: Add Portis, Kuzma while Giannis is sidelined
content: Every week in fantasy basketball, there are available players who can help fill holes in your roster. Here are the ones to add for the week ahead.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United monitor Bournemouth duo Adams, Scott
content: Manchester United drew 4-4 with Bournemouth on Monday but are scouting two of their midfielders: Alex Scott and Tyler Adams. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Bondi beach horror: Shooter Sajid Akram from Hyderabad; visited India 6 times since 1998
content: Telangana Police confirmed Sajid Akram, an accused in the Bondi Beach terror attack, is from Hyderabad, migrating to Australia 27 years ago. His radicalization had no connection to India. The attack killed 16, including a child and rabbi, with authorities investigating the duo's recent Philippines trip.

title: IPL 2026 auction: Updated players' list for all 10 teams; who got whom
content: The IPL 2026 player auction in Abu Dhabi saw Australian all-rounder Cameron Green become the costliest overseas player, snapped up by Kolkata Knight Riders for a staggering Rs 25.20 crore. David Miller found a home with Delhi Capitals for his base price, while Matheesha Pathirana also fetched a hefty sum for KKR. Several domestic talents went unsold.

title: 'Fatherly affection': Bihar min's odd defence of CM Nitish amid Hijab row; takes shot at oppn
content: Bihar's Minority Affairs Minister Zama Khan defended Chief Minister Nitish Kumar after he removed a woman doctor's hijab during a public event. Khan described the act as fatherly affection, aiming to highlight minority women's progress. The incident sparked outrage, with the Congress demanding Kumar's resignation and questioning women's safety in the state.

title: Unique gesture: Ethiopia PM drives Modi to hotel, takes detour; what's on agenda
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi arrived in Addis Ababa for a two-day State visit to Ethiopia, where he was personally received by Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed Ali. The visit aims to strengthen bilateral cooperation and reaffirm shared commitments as partners in the Global South. PM Modi will hold talks with his Ethiopian counterpart and address the Indian diaspora.

title: Europe‚Äôs 'Chinese auto problem' ‚Äòscares‚Äô US; calls Chinese vehicles a national security threat
content: Concerns are mounting in Europe and America over Chinese-made vehicles, dubbed 'computers on wheels.' Officials fear these cars and buses, produced with massive subsidies and potentially predatory practices, could pose spying, surveillance, and sabotage risks.  Lawmakers warn of economic and national security threats, comparing the danger to that of TikTok, urging strict restrictions.

title: IPL auction 2026: Most expensive buys - from Cameron Green to Prashant Veer
content: Kolkata Knight Riders made a record-breaking Rs 25.20 crore bid for Australian all-rounder Cameron Green at the IPL 2026 auction. Uncapped Indian spinner Prashant Veer also fetched a historic Rs 14.20 crore from Chennai Super Kings, becoming the most expensive uncapped player ever. Matheesha Pathirana was also secured by KKR for Rs 18 crore.

title: Messi event fiasco: CM Mamata to take sports charge; Aroop Biswas quits ministry
content: West Bengal chief minister Mamata Banerjee is reportedly set to take over the state's sports ministry. This follows sports minister Aroop Biswas offering to resign amid allegations of mismanagement and security lapses during the Lionel Messi event in Kolkata. The controversy led to spectator anger and damage to stadium property.

title: IPL auction: From borrowing spikes to Rs 8.4 crore payday; J&K's Nabi picked by DC
content: In a four-way battle, Jammu and Kashmir seamer Auqib Nabi was bagged by Delhi Capitals for a whopping ‚Çπ8.40 crore ‚Äî 28 times his base price of ‚Çπ30 lakh. Nabi‚Äôs distant dream is to open a cricket academy in Baramulla, where he can nurture more Auqibs. Now, he will finally have the means to fulfil it.

title: Croma December sale: iPhone 16 at Rs 40,990; Macbook Air M4 at Rs 55,911 & other deals
content: Croma's 'Cromtastic December Sale' is offering significant discounts on electronics from December 15, 2025, to January 4, 2026. Shoppers can find deals on smartphones like the iPhone 16 and Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, alongside laptops, TVs, and washing machines.

title: IPL auction: Venkatesh Iyer takes 70% pay cut; joins RCB from KKR
content: Venkatesh Iyer saw a significant drop in his IPL 2026 auction price, moving from Rs 23.75 crore to Rs 7 crore after Royal Challengers Bengaluru outbid Kolkata Knight Riders. Despite a recent strong domestic performance, Iyer's previous IPL season was disappointing, leading to this substantial pay cut.

title: 'Chhota packet, bada dhamaka‚Äô: Kartik Sharma‚Äôs journey to CSK deal; picked for Rs 14.20 crore
content: Once a five-year-old with a plastic bat and a dream of hitting sixes, Kartik Sharma‚Äôs rise has been shaped by grit, guidance and fearlessness. Backed by the Chahars and powered by relentless hunger, the 19-year-old‚Äôs ‚Çπ14.20 crore CSK deal marks just the beginning of a journey aimed squarely at India colours.

title: Bengaluru hotel fallout: After 4th-floor leap by girl, father flags negligence
content: A 21-year-old woman suffered severe injuries after leaping from a hotel's fourth floor in Bengaluru early Sunday. Her father alleges hotel negligence and questions the conduct of staff and police. The incident occurred after a night of partying, leading to a police intervention. Investigations are underway, with body-camera footage to be reviewed.

title: Nvidia responds to DeepSeek report; denies claims of ‚Äòbanned‚Äô chips behind January market rout
content: Nvidia has refuted claims that Chinese AI firm DeepSeek is using smuggled, restricted Blackwell chips. The report alleged DeepSeek acquired these advanced processors, banned for export to China, to train its AI models. Nvidia stated they have no evidence of such illicit activities, emphasizing their commitment to preventing circumvention of US trade restrictions.

title: IPL auction: Auqib Nabi Dar- Meet J&K pacer sold to DC for Rs 8.4 crore
content: Jammu & Kashmir pacer Auqib Nabi has been acquired by Delhi Capitals for Rs 8.40 crore in the IPL 2026 auction. Nabi's consistent domestic performances, including 15 wickets in the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy and a stellar Ranji Trophy season with 29 wickets, impressed the Capitals. His aggressive pace, wicket-taking ability, and handy batting are expected to bolster their squad.

title: Not only a 'sunshine vitamin': Why low Vitamin D can worsen Diabetes and Cholesterol
content: The pancreas contains Vitamin D receptors, which enable Vitamin D to affect insulin production, as well as the muscle and fat tissues where insulin performs its actions. Studies performed in laboratory settings and medical research facilities, show that pancreatic beta cells generate insulin more efficiently, when Vitamin D reaches adequate levels and when body tissues improve their ability to receive insulin signals

title: Venus Williams & Andrea Preti Net Worth 2025: Career, family, business income
content: Venus Williams boasts an estimated $95 million net worth in 2025, primarily from her legendary tennis career and successful fashion and design businesses. Her partner, Andrea Preti, an actor and businessman, contributes an estimated $1-2 million. Together, their combined net worth is approximately $96-97 million, reflecting their individual financial achievements.

title: IPL auction: 20-year-old left-arm pacer Prashant Veer goes to CSK; picked for Rs 14.20 crore
content: Chennai Super Kings made a significant investment at the IPL 2026 auction, securing young all-rounder Prashant Veer for Rs 14.20 crore. Veer's impressive performances in domestic tournaments caught CSK's eye, and he is expected to fill the void left by Ravindra Jadeja's departure. This strategic acquisition underscores CSK's commitment to rebuilding with promising young talent.

title: Record low! Rupee falls by 23 paise against US dollar; reaches 91.01
content: The Indian Rupee hit a new record low against the US Dollar on Tuesday. This decline is driven by foreign investors selling Indian assets and stalled trade negotiations between India and the US.  Traders anticipate further depreciation, with the Rupee potentially crossing 92 against the Dollar this month.  The currency has seen a significant drop in recent trading sessions.

title: 'It is impossible ...': Delhi minister apologises for toxic air; announces big steps
content: Delhi's Environment Minister Manjinder Singh Sirsa stated that reducing air pollution within 9-10 months is unrealistic, apologizing for the current smog. He blamed the previous AAP government for the pollution crisis, claiming his administration is working to fix it.

title: Bumper returns! This defence PSU stock emerges ‚Äòmost consistent‚Äô wealth creator‚Äô
content: Hindustan Aeronautics (HAL) has been crowned the most consistent and all-round wealth creator stock over the past five years, outperforming the Nifty Total Return Index annually.  A new report highlights HAL's impressive 75% Total Return CAGR, with PSU stocks notably leading wealth creation in this period.  This defence giant's performance is a significant achievement, making it a standout investment.

title: Rajasthan Police Constable exam result released - Check link to download scorecard
content: Rajasthan Police has released the Constable (General) final exam result for District Churu, following the PET and PMT. Selected candidates must report for pre-appointment formalities, including medical and verification, on December 23, 2025, at Reserve Police Line, Churu. All original and photocopied documents, along with admit cards and photos, are required.

title: Patrick Mahomes injury update: ACL tear spares other ligaments
content: Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes sustained a torn ACL in his left knee. An MRI scan revealed no other ligament damage. This offers positive news for his recovery. Mahomes expressed his determination to return stronger. Coach Andy Reid is optimistic about a swift rehabilitation if surgery is successful. Fans await his comeback.

title: 'Ami KKR': Cameron Green's first message; Aussie all-rounder picked for Rs 25.20 crore
content: Kolkata Knight Riders made history at the IPL auction, securing Australian all-rounder Cameron Green for a record Rs 25.20 crore, making him the most expensive overseas player ever.  Despite the massive bid, Green will earn Rs 18 crore, with the remainder supporting BCCI development.  Green expressed his excitement to join KKR and play at Eden Gardens.

title: After Arpora blaze, 'Cape Goa' sealed over fire threat; 29 LPG cylinders found on exit
content: Goa authorities sealed The Cape Goa hotel for severe safety and regulatory violations, including fire hazards and structural issues. This action follows a nightclub blaze, prompting a statewide audit of tourism establishments. The upscale hotel, operating with a temporary license, posed an imminent threat to life and property, leading to its closure until compliance.

title: IPL 2026: Complete Chennai Super Kings team; full players list
content: Chennai Super Kings enter the IPL auction with a substantial Rs 43.40 crore purse and nine slots to fill, including four overseas. The five-time champions are undertaking a significant squad overhaul, releasing several prominent players.

title: PM Modi concludes landmark visit to Jordon; thanks Crown Prince for airport farewell
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi concluded a productive two-day visit to Jordan, marking 75 years of diplomatic ties. Discussions with King Abdullah II and Crown Prince Al-Hussein bin Abdullah II strengthened cooperation in renewable energy, water management, and digital transformation. The visit underscored the warm and growing India-Jordan partnership.

title: 'Bid to kill MGNREGA': Priyanka, Rahul attack govt over renaming scheme; flags 3 changes
content: Priyanka Gandhi Vadra accused the Centre of attempting to dismantle the MGNREGA by renaming it to G RAM G. She warned that proposed changes, including shifting financial burden to states and centralizing decision-making, could lead to the scheme's collapse and eventual scrapping, despite claims of expanding employment days.

title: Gold price today: How much yellow metal costs in your city? Check rates
content: Gold prices saw a decline in futures trade as traders booked profits and awaited the US non-farm payrolls report for clues on the Federal Reserve's interest rate path. Both MCX and Comex gold futures experienced decreases, with international prices snapping a three-day winning streak.

title: MI, RR, CSK, KKR: As it happened - How Green became a 'Knight' after intense bidding war
content: An intense bidding war erupted for Australian all-rounder Cameron Green at the IPL auction, with three teams vying for his signature. Ultimately, the Kolkata Knight Riders secured Green for a staggering Rs 25.20 crore, potentially making him the most expensive player of the auction.

title: Goa nightclub fire: Luthra brothers brought to India days after blaze killed 25
content: Goa nightclub owners Saurabh and Gaurav Luthra, wanted in connection with a fatal fire that claimed 25 lives, were deported from Bangkok to India. They arrived in Delhi and are to be produced before a court before being flown to Goa. The brothers had allegedly fled to Thailand after the incident, and their passports were impounded.

title: Punches fly over parking in Delhi: Traffic cop suspended after clash near NDLS
content: A Delhi Traffic Police head constable has been suspended. This action follows a viral video showing him in a scuffle with a cab driver near New Delhi Railway Station. The incident occurred when the driver allegedly refused to move his vehicle, which was causing an obstruction. The driver reportedly slapped the constable, leading to the altercation. An investigation is ongoing.

title: Op Chakra-V: CBI cracks SIM-box fraud; 21,000 illegal SIMs used to spread fraud SMS
content: CBI busted a massive cybercrime network using over 20,000 illegally procured SIM cards, uncovering a 'phishing factory' in Delhi and Noida. The operation, 'Chakra-V', arrested three suspects and seized digital evidence, cash, and cryptocurrency. The firm, M/s Lord Mahavira Services India Pvt Ltd, allegedly facilitated bulk phishing messages by violating DoT rules.

title: AIBE 20 result 2025: BCI to release final answer key soon; check details here
content: The Bar Council of India is expected to release the AIBE 20 final answer key shortly after the objection window closed on December 10, 2025. This key will be used to prepare the AIBE 20 results, anticipated between January and February 2026, enabling law graduates to receive their Certificate of Practice.

title: 'Dhurandhar' collection day 12: Ranveer Singh starrer on its way to touch Rs 400cr
content: Dhurandhar has taken the box office by storm, becoming the highest second-weekend grosser and surpassing 'Pushpa 2'. The film's impressive ‚Çπ135 crore nett in its second weekend and a total collection of ‚Çπ385.81 crore highlight its phenomenal run, even outperforming its first weekend.

title: IPL 2026: Complete Kolkata Knight Riders team; full players list
content: Once the bidding crossed the Rs 25 crore mark, Cameron  Green surpassed the previous overseas record held by his Australia teammate Mitchell Starc, who was bought by KKR for Rs 24.75 crore at the IPL 2024 auction. Overall, Green now stands as the third costliest player in IPL auction history, behind Rishabh Pant and Punjab Kings skipper Shreyas Iyer.

title: IPL auction: Why Green will earn only Rs 18 crore despite Rs 25.20 crore bid - explained
content: Cameron Green became the most expensive overseas player in IPL auction history after Kolkata Knight Riders snapped him up for Rs 25.20 crore in Abu Dhabi. However, due to the IPL‚Äôs newly introduced ‚Äúmaximum fee‚Äù rule for overseas players at mini-auctions, the Australian all-rounder will earn only ‚Çπ18 crore ‚Äî with the remaining amount diverted for player welfare.

title: Messi tour fiasco: Show-cause notice for DGP, CP; state seeks explanation in 24 hrs
content: West Bengal authorities have issued show-cause notices to top police officials, including the DGP and Bidhannagar CP, following chaos during the Lionel Messi GOAT Tour event. Lapses in crowd control, security, and coordination led to disorder, vandalism, and the early termination of the program, prompting administrative action and an inquiry.

title: Watch: Russian submarine blows up as Ukraine claims first such underwater attack
content: Ukraine's SBU security service announced a groundbreaking naval operation, claiming its Sub Sea Baby underwater drones have critically damaged a Russian submarine in Novorossiysk port. This marks the first time Kyiv has successfully targeted a Russian submarine, which reportedly carried Kalibr cruise missile launchers. The attack escalates naval warfare in the Black Sea, following recent strikes on Turkish cargo carriers.

title: IPL auction: 73 runs off 22 balls! Sarfaraz Khan turns heads ahead of bidding wars
content: Sarfaraz Khan hammered a sensational 73 off just 22 balls for Mumbai against Rajasthan, highlighting his explosive T20 form. This rapid-fire innings, including a half-century in 15 deliveries, comes after his maiden T20 century earlier this month.  With a base price of Rs 75 lakh for the upcoming IPL auction, Sarfaraz is making a strong case for selection.

title: Yamuna Expressway crash: Fog-fueled multi-vehicle crash kills 13
content: In a shocking turn of events early Tuesday, the Delhi-Agra Expressway near Mathura witnessed a devastating blaze as multiple buses caught fire, raising concerns for those on board. The incident occurred amid a thick veil of smog engulfing Uttar Pradesh, which severely compromised visibility, even obscuring the majestic Taj Mahal.

title: India-Jordan ties: Crown Prince drives PM Modi to museum as special gesture ‚Äî see pics
content: Jordan's Crown Prince Al Hussein bin Abdullah II personally drove Prime Minister Narendra Modi to the Jordan Museum, a significant gesture during Modi's visit marking 75 years of diplomatic ties. The two-day trip, aimed at boosting bilateral relations, includes discussions with King Abdullah II on various aspects of India-Jordan cooperation and regional issues.

title: Historic low! Rupee breaches 91-mark to record all-time low against US dollar
content: The Indian rupee hit an all-time low, breaching 91 against the US dollar amid sustained foreign fund outflows and trade uncertainty. The currency extended its losing streak, weakening significantly in recent sessions. Analysts anticipate continued pressure due to delayed trade deals and FII outflows, though a weaker dollar or RBI intervention could offer support.

title: Virat, Anushka Sharma seek blessings from Premanand Maharaj in Vrindavan
content: Power couple Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma visited spiritual leader Premanand Ji Maharaj in Vrindavan for the third time. During their visit, they humbly listened to his teachings on devotion, sincerity, and viewing work as service. Maharaj emphasized seeking God above worldly comforts, a message that resonated deeply with the couple.

title: Border 2 teaser out: Sunny Deol revives iconic gun moment; Varun, Diljit lead
content: Sunny Deol returns as the fearless son of Mother India in ‚ÄòBorder 2.‚Äô After hits like ‚ÄòGadar 2,‚Äô he‚Äôs ready with another patriotic blockbuster. The teaser, unveiled today, recreated a war-zone vibe at the launch event. Directed by Anurag Singh, the film co-stars Diljit Dosanjh, Varun Dhawan, and others.

title: Video Shows Elderly Couple's Attempt to Disarm Bondi Beach Shooter
content: A new video has surfaced showing an elderly couple who were killed in the mass shooting at Sydney's Bondi Beach on Sunday trying to stop and disarm one of the attackers.

title: "Victory Of Truth Is Certain": Mallikarjun Kharge On National Herald Verdict
content: Congress President Mallikarjun Kharge on Tuesday reacted strongly to a local Delhi court's decision refusing to take cognisance of the Enforcement Directorate's (ED) chargesheet in the National Herald money laundering case.

title: Bengaluru Lecturer Sells Her Flat, 2 Plots To Pay Fake Cops Rs 2 Crore
content: She received a call from a person posing as a courier official, who claimed that a suspicious piece of baggage linked to her Aadhaar card had been seized.

title: Philippines Probes Sydney Beach Shooters' Visit To Country Before Attack
content: The Philippines is looking into reports that the father and son behind the recent deadly mass shooting in Australia had travelled to the country a month before the attack in which at least 16 people died, state media reported on Tuesday.

title: When Humanity Failed Bengaluru. A Heart Attack, A Crash And A Pleading Wife
content: A dying man and his wife, forced to go from hospital to hospital on a bike, were faced with complete indifference, first from the medical system and then, after meeting with an accident, from passersby in Bengaluru.

title: Cases Against Nawab Malik Cast Shadow On BJP-NCP Unity For Mumbai Civic Polls
content: A day after the announcement of the Municipal Corporation elections in Maharashtra, a series of meetings began in Mumbai to decide on possible alliances.

title: Australia Beach Shooter From India, Left Hyderabad 27 Years Ago: Cops
content: One of the two suspects involved in the Sydney beach attack, Sajid Akram, was an Indian national travelling on an Indian passport at the time of the incident, police said.

title: Who Is Princess Salma Of Jordan, Her Country's First Woman Pilot
content: PM Modi began his two-day visit to Jordan. He was received at the airport by Jordanian Prime Minister Jafar Hassan and accorded a ceremonial welcome.

title: In Delhi Minister's Apology For Pollution, A Barb For AAP
content: Delhi Environment Manjinder Singh Sirsa blamed the Aam Aadmi Party for the pollution in the city and declared it is "impossible for any elected government to reduce AQI in 9-10 months".

title: NSE Sustainability Recognises Adani Power For Outstanding ESG Performance, Awards 'Aspiring' Category
content: Adani Power has been ranked higher than all other major thermal, mixed fuel, and integrated energy companies in a similar appraisal, reflecting its strategic focus on sustainable growth with responsible business practices.

title: BJP Flags Controversial Slogans Ahead Of Congress's 'Vote Theft' Rally
content: The Congress's real objective is to "eliminate" Prime Minister Narendra Modi, the BJP has alleged after some leaders of the main opposition were seen raising controversial slogans at the venue of the Congress's mega rally in Delhi today.

title: 54 Tiger Deaths In Madhya Pradesh In 2025, Most Since Project Tiger Launch
content: Madhya Pradesh has already lost 54 tigers in 2025. Since the launch of Project Tiger in 1973, the state has never recorded such a high number of tiger deaths in a single year.

title: Cook Suspended Day After Worms Found In Rice In Karnataka Mid-Day Meal
content: A day after worms were found in the mid-day meal served to government schools in Karnataka's Koppal district, the district administration suspended the cook and two staff members for negligence.

title: Amid MNREGA Row, A 'North-South Divide' Over Hindi Names For New Laws
content: The row over the renaming of MNREGA has highlighted the Centre's new practice of naming bills in Hindi, deviating from the tradition of providing a Hindi and an English name for each bill.

title: "Humiliating": Mehbooba Mufti Slams Nitish Kumar For Pulling Doctor's Hijab
content: President of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Mehbooba Mufti and National Conference MP Aga Syed Ruhullah Mehdi came down heavily on Bihar CM Nitish Kumar on Tuesday over the controversial hijab incident.

title: US Offers Security Deal In Ukraine Talks But Territory Still Key
content: The Trump administration offered to provide Ukraine with strong "Article 5-like" security guarantees - a reference to NATO's mutual defense clause.

title: Who Is Bettina Anderson, Socialite Engaged To Donald Trump's Son
content: Donald Trump Jr, the eldest son of US President Donald Trump, is engaged to Palm Beach socialite and philanthropist Bettina Anderson.

title: Video: Teenager Stabs To Death 10-Year-Old, Attacks Guard In Russian School
content: A 15-year-old boy has been arrested after he fatally stabbed a 10-year-old and injured a security guard with a knife in Russia on Tuesday.

title: "Baseless, Dangerous": Himanta Sarma On Bangladesh's Remarks On Northeast
content: Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma strongly reacted to repeated remarks emerging from sections in Bangladesh suggesting the separation of Northeast India and its merger with Bangladesh, calling such notions "baseless and dangerous."

title: College football bowl season: MVPs for the first two bowl games of the season
content: south Carolina State beat Prairie View A&M 40‚Äì38 with a two-point conversion . it's one of the most exciting times of the year as the 2025 bowl season is underway . college football experts provide their MVP picks for each of the 36 bowl games this season .

title: Best fits for transfer quarterback DJ Lagway: Five schools that make the most sense
content: DJ Lagway is the top-rated quarterback in the 2024 ESPN 300 . he's coming off a 4-8 season in which he threw 14 interceptions and ranked 14th in the conference in QBR (59.5) but there's still a market for his talents if the 19-game starter can find the right situation and stay healthy .

title: MMA divisional rankings: Manel Kape makes a big move to close 2025
content: manel Kape defeats former title challenger Brandon Royval in the first round . the win shot Kape up the flyweight rankings and squarely into the championship picture . a fighter must have competed over the past 12 months or have a fight booked .

title: Which NHL teams are most at risk of a shocking playoff miss?
content: the 2025-26 season offers plenty of teams who fit that description . these are the teams who entered the season with relatively high playoff odds . but now they're most on the wrong side of the postseason bubble . we'll also identify the other teams who have a playoff berth .

title: Ranking all 64 teams in College Football Playoff history
content: the new era of college football features a larger College Football Playoff and a lower bar for inclusion . the transfer portal and increased freedom of movement for players have meant that today's best teams can't stockpile awesome backups as easily as they could in the past .

title: Aaron Rodgers, Steelers snap Dolphins' four-game win streak
content: the Steelers were en route to their 23rd consecutive "Monday Night Football" home win . a crowd of more than 65,000 cheered and waved their Terrible Towels as its opening notes filled the air . the steelers dominated the Dolphins nearly wire to wire as a short-handed defense slowed an explosive run game .

title: Latest AP poll: What's next for every Top 25 team?
content: the sixth in-season edition of the men's AP Top 25 poll features little movement . Arizona retains its No. 1 position, with no changes in the top 10 other than Gonzaga and Houston swapping the no. 7 and 8 spots . only one new team cracks this week's top 25 .

title: Free agent pickups: What can you do to replace Patrick Mahomes?
content: the 15th Sunday of the season featured several notable comebacks . a pair of season-ending knee injuries may define this week for both the short and long term . the qbs ranked second among all qBs in week 15 .

title: Winners and losers: Henderson, Lawrence paint playoff masterpiece
content: t reVeyon Henderson scored 30.1 fantasy points, had a pair of 50-plus yard touchdowns on which he was clocked at faster than 20 mph on each . in Week 10, he scored 28.0 fantasy points and ran for 105 more yards than expected .

title: Academic Intensive Care Unit initiative of Shaheen Group wins award
content: The group is helping a total of 7,500 dropouts, Madrasa graduates and slow learners rejoin mainstream schools

title: Telangana sets March-end deadline for Hyderabad Metro takeover
content: Chief Secretary says transfer must be carried out smoothly and expeditiously, in line with agreement reached between both parties during a review meeting with Committee of Secretaries and L&T officials

title: Cab drivers protest new parking rules at Kempegowda International Airport
content: Cab services to and from Kempegowda International Airport (KIA) were severely disrupted on Tuesday morning after hundreds of cab drivers staged a protest against the new parking and pick-up rules introduced by Bangalore International Airport Limited

title: Anil Akkara seeks CM‚Äôs intervention to complete Wadakkanchery LIFE Mission flats
content: The construction of the flats was halted midway despite the project being conceived as a major welfare measure of the government.

title: BIE extends date for payment of examination fee under Tatkal scheme
content: Students appearing for the examinations scheduled in March 2026 can pay the fee from December 22, 2025, to January 5, 2026, with a fine of ‚Çπ5,000 under the scheme

title: Watch: Explained: All about India‚Äôs new nuclear energy bill
content: After 10 years of battling objections from foreign nuclear suppliers, the government has brought in a new bill - It‚Äôs called SHANTI for short - The Sustainable Harnessing and Advancement of Nuclear Energy for Transforming India Bill. It repeals the previous Atomic Energy Act of 1962 and the Civil Liability for Nuclear Damage Bill of 2010. Why did the government need the new bill, and why is there opposition to its plan?

title: HC dismisses PIL challenging Kozhikode- Wayanad tunnel project
content: Wayanad Prakrithi Samrakshana Samity had challenged the environmental clearance accorded by the Union Ministry of Environment and Forests and Climate Change (MoEFCC) to the Public Works department for the project that is expected to reduce travel time between the two districts

title: Indian Army receives final batch of Apache helicopters
content: The first batch was delivered after a delay of nearly 15 months from the original delivery schedule of May 2024, primarily due to global supply chain disruptions

title: M.B. Patil for revision of UDAN scheme to help flight operations
content: Three ministers of the Congress cabinet entered into a debate on operating flights utilizing the KKRDB funds

title: Kerala Legislature International Book Festival from January 7
content: More than 200 publishers will take part and over 250 stalls will be set up. Renowned writers, journalists and socio-cultural activists will take part

title: Jagan demands CBI probe into Joji Nagar demolition
content: Alleges that Chief Minister N. Chandrababu Naidu, HRD Minister Nara Lokesh, local MP Kesineni Sivanadh and local Jana Sena corporator were behind the demolition; says 42 families residing in the colony spread across 2.17 acres of land valued at ‚Çπ150 crore were deprived of their homes

title: I will continue as CM until high command decides, declares Siddaramaiah in Legislature
content: People of the State have blessed us to rule for full five years, and we are going to win the 2028 Assembly polls too: Siddaramaiah

title: Development of IFFCO Kisan SEZ will provide 30,000 direct, 40,000 indirect jobs: Nellore Collector
content: Three major firms have already shown interest to establish units and signed MoUs, while many more are in the pipeline, according to sources

title: Centre nod to 100-bed ESIC hospital at Shamshabad
content: Clears land acquisition worth ‚Çπ16.125 crore during the 197th ESIC meeting held last week, informs Union Minister G. Kishan Reddy

title: TTD action plan to ensure pilgrims a hassle-free ‚ÄòVaikunta Ekadasi Dwara Darshan‚Äô for 10 days from December 30
content: Darshan on the first three days will be permitted only to those holding tokens issued through the e-DIP system, say officials

title: Watch: G RAM G Bill an assault on MGNREGA‚Äôs spirit and philosophical foundation: Shashi Tharoor
content: Congress MP Shashi Tharoor strongly opposed the proposed G RAM G Bill in the Lok Sabha, calling it a retrograde move that undermines India‚Äôs commitment to its most vulnerable citizens.

title: Sydney Bondi Beach attacker was from Hyderabad
content: Telangana Police confirm no local links of Sajid Akram as he maintained limited contact with his family over the past 27 years, and visited India only six times

title: TTD gives the nod for a 20-acre integrated township in Tirupati
content: It is envisaged as a comprehensive hub to streamline accommodation, transport access, and essential services for the devotees visiting Tirumala

title: War of words breaks out between KC factions over electoral performance
content: After P.J. Joseph ridiculed the KC(M) as a party that has lost its relevance, KC(M) chairman Jose K. Mani asserts that the party‚Äôs electoral results, including maintaining ten councillors in Pala, reflect its organisational strength.

title: Prakash Veer interview: On working with Darshan and making ‚ÄòThe Devil‚Äô
content: Kannada filmmaker Prakash Veer talks to The Hindu about making ‚ÄòThe Devil‚Äô, starring Darshan, fondly called ‚ÄòD Boss‚Äô by his fans.

title: West Bengal Sports Minister Aroop Biswas resigns over chaos at Lionel Messi‚Äôs event at Salt Lake stadium
content: West Bengal government issues show cause to Director General of Police Rajeev Kumar and Commissionerate of Bidhannagar City Police Mukesh Kumar

title: Watch: ‚ÄòVB-G RAM G‚Äô Bill will weaken MGNREGA: Priyanka Gandhi
content: Congress leader and Wayanad MP Priyanka Gandhi Vadra mounted a strong protest in Parliament against the Centre‚Äôs proposed Bill to replace MGNREGA, warning that it weakens the legal right to employment.

title: Bombay High Court reserves order on PIL seeking CBI probe into Lavasa project
content: Petition alleges illegal land deals, stamp duty exemptions and misuse of public resources; names Pawar family members

title: Opposition‚Äôs forest, mining claims trigger Assembly uproar in Chhattisgarh
content: Vishnu Deo Sai-led BJP Government working for the benefit of industrialists and capitalists: Opposition

title: Declared ‚Äòdead‚Äô in draft rolls, Trinamool councillor walks into crematorium, demands own last rites
content: Surya Dey, the Trinamool councillor of Dankuni Municipality‚Äôs Ward 18, said that while checking the lists linked to the Special Intensive Revision (SIR) exercise, he claimed his name figured among the ‚Äúdead‚Äù, though he had filled and submitted his enumeration form to the booth-level officer

title: Heads and deputy heads of local bodies in Kerala to be elected on December 26 and 27
content: The chairpersons and Mayors of municipalities and corporations, respectively, will be elected at 10.30 a.m. on December 26. Deputy chairpersons of municipalities and Deputy Mayors of Corporations will be elected at 2.30 p.m. on the same day.

title: Kerala seeks withdrawal of ‚ÄòVB G RAM G‚Äô Bill replacing MGNREGS
content: Kerala would be one of the most adversely affected States if the proposed legislation is allowed to become a law because it puts an annual additional liability of ‚Çπ1,600 crore on the State, says Minister for Local Self-Governments department M.B. Rajesh.

title: Cold wave alert in six Telangana districts on December 17
content: According to IMDs latest bulletin, cold wave conditions are very likely to prevail at isolated pockets in Adilabad, Kumaram Bheem Asifabad, Mancherial, Sangareddy, Medak and Kamareddy districts

title: Singareni Collieries, Altmin to collaborate for battery-grade lithium refinery in Telangana‚Äôs Hyderabad
content: The refinery is targeted to commence operations by 2027 and poised to play a strategic role in supporting India‚Äôs rapidly growing electric vehicle and energy storage ecosystem

title: ‚ÄòNoise pollution‚Äô by azaan triggers debate in Karnataka Council
content: BJP member D.S. Arun stated that he and his family members had been disturbed by the regular azaan from a mosque close to his place in Shivamogga

title: Karnataka government acted on violation of Kannada language Act by two schools in Bengaluru, says Minister Madhu Bangarappa
content: BJP MLC claims that many CBSE and ICSE schools hardly teach the language, which was evident by the fact that students from such schools struggle to read Kannada

title: Bengal Govt issues show-cause notices to DGP, senior officers for Messi event 'mismanagement' at Salt Lake Stadium
content: The State Government suspended Bidhannagar Deputy Commissioner of Police Aneesh Sarkar and initiated departmental proceedings against him for reported negligence of duty on the day of the event

title: BJP eyes stronger NDA for 2026 T.N. Assembly polls with fresh election in-charge appointments
content: On December 15, BJP national president J.P. Nadda appointed Union Minister of Commerce and Industry Piyush Goyal as the election in-charge for Tamil Nadu

title: Infopark Kochi proposes shifting SilverLine station to Phase 3 to free up frozen land under Phase 2
content: Infopark proposal points out that if SilverLine proceeds as per its current alignment, it would be more ideal to have the station in Phase 3 rather than Phase 2

title: One of two Bondi Beach attackers is an Indian, last visited Hyderabad in 2022: Indian officials
content: Officials said that preliminary investigation does not establish any local links in India to the deceased attacker

title: Jaishankar arrives in Israel on two-day visit; to hold talks with top leadership
content: The visit comes as preparations are underway for Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's proposed trip to India

title: Andhra‚Äôs Vissannapeta police launch search for ‚ÄòLife is Beautiful‚Äô CEO Shivani
content: The couple opened the company two years ago and collected about Rs.20 crore deposits in AP and Telangana, the victims alleged

title: Andhra ‚ÄãCM Naidu stresses on need to promote Naturopathy, Yoga for preventive wellness
content: The CM said the government was implementing the guidelines prescribed by the World Health Organization to meet various standards in the health sector

title: IFFK 2025: Kerala Culture Minister directs Chalachitra Academy to screen all films denied censor exemption by Centre
content: Saji Cherian lashes out at Union government for adopting ‚Äòan anti-democratic approach towards Kerala's progressive art and cultural tradition‚Äô

title: ISRO releases RESPOND Basket 2025, invites submission of research proposals
content: The RESPOND BASKET comprises the most urgent and important research problems identified by ISRO and Department of Space Centre/Units on the basis of ISRO‚Äôs upcoming programmatic R&D requirements

title: Bihar Cabinet clears Saat Nischay-3 roadmap for 2025‚Äì30
content: Programme aims to double income and employment, strengthen industry, agriculture, health, education and ease of living

content: Revanth Reddy said an estimated ‚Çπ30,000 crore would be required for the construction of these residential schools and other educational institutions

title: Trinamool says Bengal draft rolls 'puncture' BJP's 'one crore Rohingyas' claim as 'ghost voters' at 1.83L
content: BJP‚Äôs Suvendu Adhikari had earlier alleged that illegal Bangladeshi and Rohingya immigrants were present in large numbers in West Bengal and had influenced electoral outcomes in the past

title: Bengaluru: Two held for peddling ganja at Hebbal; Kengeri police arrest one in separate case
content: In one case, a man was caught allegedly selling ganja near the helipad close to Kengeri Satellite Club.

title: TVK outlines security, logistical plans for Vijay‚Äôs December 18 meeting in Erode
content: Speaking to the media at the venue, party leader K.A. Sengottaiyan said the arrangements included the installation of 40 CCTV cameras and the provision of 40 walkie-talkies for emergency communication

title: West Bengal SIR draft electoral roll: How to check your name in voter list
content: The draft electoral roll for West Bengal after the Special Intensive Revision was released on Tuesday.

title: Sonia seeks doubling of Centre's contribution to pay of ASHA, anganwadi workers
content: "Across the country, ASHA workers undertake immunisation, mobilisation, maternal health, and family welfare. Yet, they remain volunteers with low honorarium and limited social security," says Sonia Gandhi

title: Kerala CPI(M) leader booked for remarks about women
